sqlMap.select: SELECT A.YEAR, B.EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID, B.EVAL_CAT_GRP_NM, A.BOSS_METRIC_ID, A.BOSS_METRIC_NM, A.WEIGHT BOSS_WEIGHT, A.EVAL_SCORE AS BOSS_EVAL_SCORE, C.WEIGHT GOV_WEIGHT, GS.GOV_SCORE, A.EVAL_METHOD_ID, F_CODE_NM('146',A.EVAL_METHOD_ID,A.YEAR) EVAL_METHOD_NM, D.SC_DEPT_NM, E.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM, COUNT(1) OVER(PARTITION BY A.EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID ) GRP_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID ORDER BY B.SORT_ORDER, B.EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID, A.SORT_ORDER, A.BOSS_METRIC_ID) GRP_NUM FROM BOSS_METRIC A INNER JOIN BOSS_CAT_GRP B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID = B.EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN GOV_METRIC C ON A.YEAR = C.YEAR AND A.GOV_METRIC_ID = C.GOV_METRIC_ID AND C.DELETE_DT IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN GOV_SCORE_YEAR GS ON C.YEAR = GS.YEAR AND C.GOV_METRIC_ID = GS.GOV_METRIC_ID INNER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT D ON A.YEAR = D.YEAR AND A.SC_DEPT_ID = D.SC_DEPT_ID AND D.DELETE_DT IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN V_ROLE_USER E ON A.INSERT_USER_ID = E.USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.DELETE_DT IS NULL ORDER BY B.SORT_ORDER, B.EVAL_CAT_GRP_ID, A.SORT_ORDER, A.BOSS_METRIC_ID
SELECT YEAR , BOSS_METRIC_ID , BOSS_EVAL_SCORE , CREATE_ID FROM BOSS_SCORE_YEAR WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND BOSS_METRIC_ID = #bossMetricId#

sqlMap.update: UPDATE BOSS_METRIC SET EVAL_SCORE = #bossEvalScore# WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND BOSS_METRIC_ID = #bossMetricId#
DELETE FROM BOSS_SCORE_YEAR WHERE 1 = 1 AND YEAR = #year# AND BOSS_METRIC_ID = #bossMetricId#
